By using this app, you agree to the following:
Educational Use Only – This app is made for learning and improving reading comprehension.
Supervised Use – Children under 13 should use the app with a parent, guardian, or teacher.
No Misuse – Please don’t copy, modify, or share the app in ways not allowed by the developers.
Data and Privacy – The app may collect basic learning progress (like quiz scores) for research and improvement. Personal information will not be shared.
No Guarantee – Since this is part of an academic project, we cannot promise the app will always be perfect or error-free.
Research Participation – By using the app, you agree that your anonymized results may be used for study purposes.
If you continue, it means you accept these terms.
